skins.shipDescription: A-class destroyer C Ardent, Hull Number H41.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Ardent, the third ship of the A class destroyers. Hmm... I don't have much to say other than things about Glorious. But I worked during that time, you know? Well, with that out of the way, I'm happy that I got you meet you, Commander! I hope we can get along from now on, ok?
skins.acquisition: I'm moving over to your place today, Commander~ Take good care of me~
skins.login: Want some snacks, Commander? I saved some for you.
skins.details: Um... even though I've been living here, I'm still not used to being watched by you... Am I... weird? Ahaha...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are you hungry, Commander? Let's have a lunch together?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Uh, C-Commander, are there spare parts? I want to do a bit of periodic checking~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Uh, have you heard about it? Ugh... so you've gotten bored of me... Just kidding~
skins.secretaryTouch: Umm... if we walk so close together, people might misunderstand...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whaa! This kind of thing... At least wait until you're at home!

skins.shipDescription: New outfit, new rigging, same ardent spirit! Ahaha, I'm serious~! Commander, thanks a lot~!
skins.acquisition: New outfit, new rigging, same ardent spirit! Ahaha, I'm serious~! Commander, thanks a lot~!
skins.login: Commander, did you miss my cooking? Hold on just a second~ it's coming right up!
skins.details: Commander, don't you also think that these clothes are way cuter?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I've found some hot date spots, wanna come with me some time?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, what kind of lunch would you like me to pack you for tomorrow?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey, Commander, don't you think Acasta would be super cute if she got dolled up a bit?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, just being around you has taught me a lot about how the fleet works. That's right~ you can just sit back and leave it to me~!

skins.shipDescription: Ehehe~ What do you think, Commander? If you're just going to say "cute," I won't know if you're talking about my school uniform or the chocolate I made...
skins.acquisition: Ehehe~ What do you think, Commander? If you're just going to say "cute," I won't know if you're talking about my school uniform or the chocolate I made...
skins.login: Good day, Commander. Let's go have lunch on the rooftop today?
skins.details: Glorious and Acasta seem to have their lunchboxes... Good, I'm glad they didn't forget today. Commander, did you remember to bring yours as well?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Acasta, when you're giving out chocolate, you have to lean up against the other person and whisper in their ear. Don't you think it's more heart-pounding that way?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ark Royal gave me some chocolate! Unlike Glorious, she seems to be pretty good with her hands... Ahaha
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'll study hard for the glory of the Royal― Who am I kidding~? I just want to be with you today, Commander~
skins.secretaryTouch: Did you want some chocolate? Mm, okay. I'll go make some for you.
